content.text: How to Use JavaScript for AI and ML
JavaScript can be utilized in AI and ML through libraries and frameworks that enable data manipulation, model training, and visualization.

1. TensorFlow.js: A library for training and deploying ML models in the browser using JavaScript.
2. Brain.js: A library designed for neural networks in JavaScript for both Node.js and browser environments.
3. Synaptic: A lightweight neural network library for building and training networks.
JavaScript can be used for applications such as chatbots, image recognition, and data analysis in web applications.
